title: It’s now easier to update your apps in the Google Play Store
dc:creator: Retail Asia
description:
read the original version on: www.retailnews.asia

The guys over at Mountain View are tinkerers by nature. How else can you explain why there are so many small changes made to the Android UI or the UI on Android apps? These changes are usually made to improve the user experience. And Google has done it again, this time making a small but […]
